meanings.definition: The quality of being relaxed and tolerant in attitude or manner.
meanings.sent1: Her easygoingness made everyone feel comfortable around her.
meanings.sent2: I admire his easygoingness in handling stressful situations.
meanings.sent3: His easygoingness was so contagious that even the grumpiest person smiled.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, her easygoingness was a beacon of calm.
meanings.sent5: The easygoingness of the beach town was exactly what I needed for a relaxing vacation.

meanings.definition: A state of being calm and unworried in nature.
meanings.sent1: The easygoingness of the park on a sunny day was soothing.
meanings.sent2: His easygoingness during the storm surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's easygoingness towards the playful puppy was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The easygoingness of the mountain peak at sunrise was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: I strive for the easygoingness of a carefree child playing in the park.
